categories.name: Sanitation Essentials
categories.description: Keep your portable restrooms clean and well-stocked

categories.name: Odor Control
categories.description: Eliminate unpleasant odors and keep units fresh

products.name: AmazonCommercial 2-Ply Toilet Paper (80 Rolls)
products.description: Bulk 2-ply toilet paper for high-traffic portable restrooms and events. FSC-Certified, 400 sheets per roll.

products.name: PURELL Advanced Hand Sanitizer Gel (64 oz Refill)
products.description: Professional-grade gel sanitizer for refilling dispensers. Kills 99.99% of germs.

products.name: GOJO Premium Foam Handwash Refill (2 Pack)
products.description: Premium foaming hand soap for portable hand wash stations. 1200 mL per refill, up to 2000 uses each.

products.name: Scott Essential Multifold Paper Towels (16 Packs)
products.description: Commercial-grade paper towels for hand wash stations and restroom trailers. 250 towels per pack.

products.name: Camco TST MAX RV Toilet Treatment (30 Pack)
products.description: Drop-in deodorizer packets that neutralize odors. Works in porta potties and RV toilets. Orange scent.

products.name: Walex Porta-Pak Holding Tank Deodorizer (50 Pack)
products.description: Professional-grade packets that break down waste and eliminate odors. Formaldehyde-free and septic safe.

products.name: Camco TST Blue Enzyme Holding Tank Treatment (1 Gallon)
products.description: Concentrated blue deodorizing liquid for portable toilets. Formaldehyde-free, treats up to 40 gallons.

products.name: Febreze Air Heavy Duty Crisp Clean (8.8 oz, 3 Pack)
products.description: Industrial strength air freshener spray for instant odor elimination. Uses 100% natural propellants.

products.name: Restroom Directional Signs with Arrow (4 Pack)
products.description: Weather-resistant directional signs to guide guests to portable restroom locations. Acrylic, 9x3 inches.

products.name: 28 Inch Traffic Safety Cones (6 Pack)
products.description: Reflective safety cones for marking restroom areas and directing traffic. PVC with dual reflective collars.

products.name: SOLPEX Solar Pathway Lights (12 Pack)
products.description: Solar-powered LED lights to illuminate pathways to portable restrooms at night. Stainless steel, waterproof.

products.name: Yellow Caution Tape (1000 ft Roll)
products.description: Bright yellow caution tape for marking off areas and guiding foot traffic. 3 inches wide, non-adhesive.

products.name: Simple Green Industrial Cleaner (1 Gallon)
products.description: Heavy-duty all-purpose cleaner for portable restroom interiors. Non-toxic, biodegradable, EPA Safer Choice.

products.name: MedPride Nitrile Gloves (1000 Count)
products.description: Disposable powder-free nitrile gloves for sanitary cleaning and maintenance. Latex-free, case of 10 boxes.

products.name: Heavy-Duty Scrub Brush Set (3 Pack)
products.description: Industrial scrub brushes for thorough portable restroom cleaning. Includes long handle, handheld, and detail brush.

products.name: Heavy Duty Spray Bottles (3 Pack, 32 oz)
products.description: Commercial chemical-resistant spray bottles for cleaning solutions. Adjustable nozzle, leak-proof design.

products.name: Camco Portable Travel Toilet (5.3 Gallon)
products.description: Portable toilet for camping, emergencies, or small outdoor events. Detachable holding tank with bellow flush.

products.name: Reliance Double Doodie Waste Bags (6 Pack)
products.description: Waste bags with bio-gel for portable and emergency toilets. Double-bagged design for leak protection.

products.name: GigaTent Pop Up Privacy Tent
products.description: Instant pop-up privacy tent for portable toilets at camping or events. 74 inches tall, lightweight and foldable.

products.name: Reliance Products Luggable Loo Portable Toilet
products.description: Emergency bucket toilet with snap-on seat. Great for disaster preparedness, camping, and hunting.
